pages.title: Summoning Scroll
pages.text: You can summon a fey by RIGHT clicking with a fey summoning scroll. Once used you get a empty summoning scroll, by LEFT clicking your fey when it's stationary you can put the fey back into the summoning scroll.

pages.title: Following
pages.text: Some fey follow you around the world. You can make a fey follow and stop following you by SHIFT-RIGHT clicking.

pages.title: Quest
pages.text: All the Pixies have a quest-line, when you summoned one you can see the Quest by RIGHT clicking the Pixies, with an empty hand. The Pixie first asks you to accept a contract and you will become a Ally of that Court.

pages.title: Alignment
pages.text: When accepting the contract with the Pixie you are aligned with that Court. When allied to a Court you can summon other Fey of that Court. When aligning yourself with a Court all Fey of other Courts will leave!
